inducements.name: Prayers to Nuffle
inducements.description: Roll 1D16 on the Prayers to Nuffle table for each one purchased. The effects last until the end of the match.

inducements.name: Part-time Assistant Coaches
inducements.description: Add +1 to the team's assistant coaches total for kick-off events for each one purchased.

inducements.name: Temporary Cheerleaders
inducements.description: Add +1 to the team's cheerleaders total for kick-off events for each one purchased.

inducements.name: Team Mascot
inducements.description: Your team gains an additional team re-roll for the match.

inducements.name: Weather Mage
inducements.description: Once per match, you may force a re-roll of the Weather table.

inducements.name: Bloodweiser Kegs
inducements.description: Apply a +1 modifier to rolls to recover KO'd players for each keg purchased.

inducements.name: Bribe
inducements.description: Once per match per Bribe, you may attempt to prevent one of your players from being Sent Off. Roll a D6: on 2+, the player is not Sent Off.

inducements.name: Extra Training
inducements.description: Your team gains an additional team re-roll for each Extra Training purchased.

inducements.name: Mortuary Assistant
inducements.description: Once per match, a dead player may be Regenerated on a 4+ instead of being removed from the roster.

inducements.name: Plague Doctor
inducements.description: Once per match, one of your players may re-roll a failed Regeneration roll.

inducements.name: Riotous Rookies
inducements.description: At the start of the match, place D3 additional Linemen on your team's reserves box. They have no skills and are removed after the match.

inducements.name: Wandering Apothecary
inducements.description: Each Wandering Apothecary allows you to use an Apothecary action once per match.

inducements.name: Halfling Master Chef
inducements.description: At the start of each half, roll 3D6. For each 4+, your opponent loses one team re-roll and you gain one.

inducements.name: Biased Referee
inducements.description: Apply a +1 modifier when Arguing the Call. Additionally, after an opponent's Foul that doesn't result in an ejection, roll D6: on 5+, the player is Sent Off.

inducements.name: Josef Bugman
inducements.description: Apply +1 to recover KO'd players. Once per match, after deployment but before kick-off, you may redeploy 1D3 players.

inducements.name: Mercenary Player
inducements.description: Hire a player from your team list. The mercenary has Loner (4+). For +50,000, add one Primary skill.

inducements.name: Star Player
inducements.description: Hire a Star Player available to your team. Star Players do not gain SPP and cannot be permanently injured.

inducements.name: Wizard
inducements.description: Once per match, cast either Fireball (place the ball, roll 2D6 for all players within 3 squares) or Lightning Bolt (target one player).

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Treacherous Trapdoor
prayers_to_nuffle.description: When any player enters a trapdoor square, roll D6. On 1, they fall through.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Friend of the Ref
prayers_to_nuffle.description: Treat any 5 or 6 when Arguing the Call as 'Now that you mention it...'

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Stiletto
prayers_to_nuffle.description: One random player gains the Stab trait.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Greased Cleats
prayers_to_nuffle.description: One random opponent player has -1 MV (min 1).

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Moles Under the Pitch
prayers_to_nuffle.description: Opponent players apply -1 to Going for It rolls.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Perfect Passing
prayers_to_nuffle.description: Completed passes earn 2 SPP instead of 1.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Crowd Support
prayers_to_nuffle.description: If an opponent is injured by a crowd push, the pusher earns 2 SPP.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Foul Play
prayers_to_nuffle.description: Fouls that cause injuries earn 2 SPP.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Rock Throw
prayers_to_nuffle.description: Once per match, at start of your turn, pick a random opponent on pitch. On 4+, they are Knocked Down.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Ref Scrutiny
prayers_to_nuffle.description: Opponents committing fouls are automatically Sent Off if armor is broken.

prayers_to_nuffle.name: Intensive Training
prayers_to_nuffle.description: One random player gains a Primary skill of your choice.
